name: The Maze Of Burkitshi
description:
Jump into the adventure and try to cross the maze in order to find the rumoured treasure,but be careful,the maze will be lying to you and u'll need to discover where is the lie...in order to overcome that, u'll need to find and collect the 'Lying Crystals' that create illusions around the maze,then break them.
            Use your eagle view for an extra help to guide urself in the maze,ENJOY!
ZQSD for movement,SPACE for jump,SHIFT for sprint,X for character view,V for eagle view.
